In the sky, the red streak caught the Khan's eye. He zoomed to see it 
better.

Vlad: What is that? It seems to be a capsule or a projectile of some 
kind... I will go and investigate.

Transforming to mech mode, he started running towards where his 
systems told him the object would fall.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Pod::
> 
> A pod fell from the sky and landed some miles from Tripedocus base. 
A 
> distress signal appeared, but so weak that just the nearest base 
> could caught it, soon and the scanning process begun.
